byline.original: By MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM and MATT FLEGENHEIMER

abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio is poised to hire 1,300 additional police officers as part of $78.5 billion budget reached with city leaders; de Blasio stresses that his pledge remains to also improve police-community relations.
lead_paragraph: The hirings, a sharp shift for a mayor who has long been hesitant to expand the force, are a surprising addition in a $78.5 billion budget deal announced by city leaders.

headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Poised to Hire Nearly 1,300 Police Officers
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Is Poised to Add Officers
